user.title: Muslim Assistant Setup
user.description: Location is automatically detected from your Home Assistant settings. Just choose your preferred prayer calculation method.

data_description.name: A name for this Muslim Assistant instance.
data_description.calculation_method: The prayer time calculation method (e.g., ISNA, MWL, Makkah).
data_description.school: Standard (Shafi/Maliki/Hanbali) or Hanafi school for Asr calculation.

audio.title: Audio & Speaker Settings
audio.description: Choose your Quran reciter, Adhan sound, and select the speakers to play audio on. You can pick multiple devices.

data_description.quran_reciter: Select your preferred Quran reciter for audio playback.
data_description.adhan_sound: Select the Adhan sound you prefer.
data_description.target_media_player: Select one or more media players (Alexa, Google Home, Sonos, phone, etc.). Audio will play on all selected devices.

prayer_adjustments.title: Prayer Time Adjustments
prayer_adjustments.description: Adjust prayer times by adding or subtracting minutes. Range: -30 to +30 minutes.

data_description.fajr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Fajr time.
data_description.dhuhr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Dhuhr time.
data_description.asr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Asr time.
data_description.maghrib_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Maghrib time.
data_description.isha_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Isha time.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Enable built-in automations. These run automatically inside the integration â€” no manual setup needed.

data.auto_play_adhan: Play Adhan at every prayer time
data.auto_quran_after_fajr: Play Quran after Fajr (Surah Al-Mulk, 15 min delay)

data_description.auto_play_adhan: Automatically plays the Adhan on your configured speakers when each prayer time arrives. Skips Sunrise.
data_description.auto_prayer_notification: Sends a mobile notification when each prayer time arrives. Requires a notification service below.
data_description.notification_service: Select your notification service (e.g., notify.mobile_app_your_phone). Required for notifications and Suhoor reminders.
data_description.auto_quran_after_fajr: Plays Surah Al-Mulk on your speakers 15 minutes after Fajr prayer.
data_description.auto_surah_kahf_friday: Plays Surah Al-Kahf on your speakers every Friday morning.
data_description.auto_suhoor_reminder: Sends a Suhoor reminder notification during Ramadan when Fajr is approaching. Requires a notification service.
